item.description:
@short_asian_kid wrote:

Are you sure firemaking is skill 11? And it should work, you probably just don’t notice because it is Misc.random…
and make sure you filled in the rest of the public int firemakingRandom() else it will not work.

item.title: Misc Random
item.dc:creator: @short_asian_kid short_asian_kid
item.description:
@short_asian_kid wrote:

if (((itemUsed == 590) && (otherItem == 1511) || (itemUsed == 1511) && (otherItem == 590))){ sM("You attempt to light the logs."); pEmote = 733; if (Misc.random(100/(playerLevel[11])) == (1)){ deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); addSkillXP(80, 11); fmwalkto(0, -1); resetAnimation(); }

Would be better to do something like (Add this in the beggining of your class)

public int firemakingReturn() { if(playerLevel[11] >= 1 && playerLevel[11] <= 5) { return 1; } else if(playerLevel[11] >= 6 && playerLevel[11] <= 10) { return 2; } } and change your code to

if (((itemUsed == 590) && (otherItem == 1511) || (itemUsed == 1511) && (otherItem == 590))){ sM("You attempt to light the logs."); pEmote = 733; if (Misc.random(100/firemakingReturn()) == (1)){ deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); addSkillXP(80, 11); fmwalkto(0, -1); resetAnimation(); }

Read full topic

item.title: Misc Random
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

hey guys, im working on firemaking.

Im trying to make if you firemaking lvl is high you make the fire fastere ? what did i wrong ?

[code]if (((itemUsed == 590) && (otherItem == 1511) || (itemUsed == 1511) && (otherItem == 590)))
{
sM(“You attempt to light the logs.”);
pEmote = 733;

if (Misc.random(100) == (playerLevel[11]/6 * 0.015))
{
deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1);
makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10);
addSkillXP(80, 11);
fmwalkto(0, -1);
resetAnimation();
}[/code]
